sources.description: Title: The Runaway Bus Summary: When heavy fog prevents all aircraft from leaving London airport, a group of passengers take an airline bus to get them to an alternative airport. However, one among their number is the ... Directed by: Val Guest Actors: Marianne Stone, Lionel Murton, Lisa Gastoni Production Company: Val Guest Productions Release Date: 8 October 1954 (Finland) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When heavy fog prevents all aircraft from leaving London airport, a group of passengers take an airline bus to get them to an alternative airport. However, one among their number is the mastermind behind a bullion robbery at the airport... and particularly keen to escape the fog!
